823780.name: AVATARIKA - Premium Pack
823780.description:
The premium pack contains plenty of useful items and will allow you to enjoy the game to its fullest. It includes useful consumables and no less than 10 days of VIP status!

Buying this pack will give you items at a significant discount!
Please note that the premium pack can only be purchased once.

The pack contains:


  • VIP status for 10 days
    If you have VIP status in the game, you will be able to draw big salary, have personal island with a house, use two apartments, achieve a high level of sewing handicraft etc.
  • Many-colored nickname
    Stand out of the crowd! Nickname of unusual color will certainly attract people's attention!
  • Prestige multiplier х3
    This item triples prestige you receive. It work during 3 days spent in the game. Click to activate it. Doesn’t stack with Prestige multiplier х2.
  • Lively pet (7 days)
    Improves pet's needs and "freezes" them for 7 days. Make your pet happy!
  • Kit "Clinic" (10 items)
    This unique kit will improve your needs as well as prevent them from falling for the next 6 hours.


The items from the pack cannot be transferred to other players.
823780.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
